meanings.definition: Characterized by or inclined to frequenting clubs.
meanings.sent1: She is the clubbiest person I know, always going out with friends.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends had a clubbiest night out at the local bar.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his cat was the clubbiest in the neighborhood, always hanging out with other cats.
meanings.sent4: The city's nightlife was at its clubbiest during the summer festivals.
meanings.sent5: The clubbiest atmosphere in town can be found at the new jazz club.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a club or clubs.
meanings.sent1: The clubbiest events are always held at the community center.
meanings.sent2: She wore a clubbiest outfit to the dance, complete with a varsity jacket.
meanings.sent3: The clubbiest decorations for the party included banners and balloons.
meanings.sent4: The clubbiest music played at the event got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent5: The clubbiest members of the group organized the charity fundraiser.

meanings.sent1: The clubbiest feature of the house was the basement bar.
meanings.sent2: The clubbiest colors for the event were black and gold.
meanings.sent3: The clubbiest menu for the party included finger foods and cocktails.
meanings.sent4: The clubbiest vibe of the restaurant made it a popular hangout spot.
meanings.sent5: The clubbiest tradition of the group was to meet every Friday night.
